an8.29:1.1: “‘Khanakicco loko, khanakicco loko’ti, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano bhasati, no ca kho so janati khanam va akkhanam va.
an8.29:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, tathagato ca loke uppanno hoti araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava, dhammo ca desiyati opasamiko parinibbaniko sambodhagami sugatappavedito;
an8.29:1.6: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathamo akkhano asamayo brahmacariyavasaya.
an8.29:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, tathagato ca loke uppanno hoti …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava, dhammo ca desiyati opasamiko parinibbaniko sambodhagami sugatappavedito;
an8.29:4.2: ayanca puggalo annataram dighayukam devanikayam upapanno hoti …pe….
an8.29:5.2: ayanca puggalo paccantimesu janapadesu paccajato hoti, so ca hoti avinnataresu milakkhesu, yattha natthi gati bhikkhunam bhikkhuninam upasakanam upasikanam …pe….
an8.29:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave …pe… ayanca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccajato hoti, so ca hoti micchaditthiko viparitadassano:
an8.29:6.2: ‘natthi dinnam, natthi yittham, natthi hutam, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako, natthi ayam loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mata, natthi pita, natthi satta opapatika, natthi loke samanabrahmana sammaggata samma patipanna ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti …pe….
an8.29:7.2: ayanca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccajato hoti, so ca hoti duppanno jalo elamugo appatibalo subhasitadubbhasitassa atthamannatum.
an8.29:7.3: Ayam, bhikkhave, sattamo akkhano asamayo brahmacariyavasaya.
an8.29:8.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, tathagato ca loke anuppanno hoti araham sammasambuddho …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava.
an8.29:8.2: Dhammo ca na desiyati opasamiko parinibbaniko sambodhagami sugatappavedito. Ayanca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccajato hoti, so ca hoti pannava ajalo anelamugo patibalo subhasitadubbhasitassa atthamannatum.
an8.29:8.3: Ayam, bhikkhave, atthamo akkhano asamayo brahmacariyavasaya.
an8.29:9.1: Ime kho, bhikkhave, attha akkhana asamaya brahmacariyavasaya.
an8.29:10.1: Ekova kho, bhikkhave, khano ca samayo ca brahmacariyavasaya.
an8.29:10.3: Idha, bhikkhave, tathagato ca loke uppanno hoti araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava.
an8.29:10.4: Dhammo ca desiyati opasamiko parinibbaniko sambodhagami sugatappavedito. Ayanca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccajato hoti, so ca hoti pannava ajalo anelamugo patibalo subhasitadubbhasitassa atthamannatum.
an8.29:10.5: Ayam, bhikkhave, ekova khano ca samayo ca brahmacariyavasayati.
